name: SumoSmack
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Right Click - Fire Rocket

Left Click - Swing

Goal: Hit the other player out of the ring.

Players: 2 - 6. More possible just less than 7 is optimal.

Host a server, Forward ports 7777 and 10000. Have everyone join on you via your ip. (https://www.google.com/webhp?#q=what+is+my+ip)
